summary: DDPOTrainer orchestrates the training of Stable Diffusion models using Deep Diffusion Policy Optimization. It manages configuration, reward and prompt generation, sample creation, optimizer setup, loss computation, and model checkpointing while optionally logging generated images.
business_intent: Enable organizations to improve the quality and controllability of AI-generated images by applying reinforcement‑learning‑style optimization to diffusion models, facilitating customized content creation and higher‑performing generative pipelines.
